00020 template <class InterfaceType>
00021 class TComposedFactory: virtual public TIFactory<InterfaceType>
00022 {
00023 public:
00024        typedef TIFactory<InterfaceType> FactoryInterface;
00025 
00032        bool RegisterFactory(FactoryInterface* factoryPtr, bool releaseFlag = false);
00033 
00034        // reimplemented (istd::IFactoryInfo)
00035        virtual IFactoryInfo::KeyList GetFactoryKeys() const;
00036

00038        virtual InterfaceType* CreateInstance(const QByteArray& keyId = "") const;
00039

00041        typedef istd::TOptDelPtr<FactoryInterface> FactoryPtr;
00042        typedef QList<FactoryPtr> FactoryList;
00043 
00044        FactoryList m_factoryList;

00048 // public methods
00049 
00050 template <class InterfaceType>
00051 bool TComposedFactory<InterfaceType>::RegisterFactory(FactoryInterface* factoryPtr, bool releaseFlag)
00052 {
00053        Q_ASSERT(factoryPtr != NULL);
00054 
00055        if ((factoryPtr == NULL) || factoryPtr->GetFactoryKeys().isEmpty()){
00056               return false;
00057        }
00058 
00059        m_factoryList.push_back(FactoryPtr());
00060        m_factoryList.back().SetPtr(factoryPtr, releaseFlag);
00061 
00062        return true;
00063 }
00064 
00065        
00066 // reimplemented (istd::IFactoryInfo)
00067 
00068 template <class InterfaceType>
00069 IFactoryInfo::KeyList TComposedFactory<InterfaceType>::GetFactoryKeys() const
00070 {
00071        IFactoryInfo::KeyList retVal;
00072        for (         typename FactoryList::const_iterator iter = m_factoryList.begin();
00073                             iter != m_factoryList.end();
00074                             ++iter){
00075               const FactoryPtr& factoryPtr = *iter;
00076 
00077               IFactoryInfo::KeyList factoryKeys = factoryPtr->GetFactoryKeys();
00078 
00079               retVal += factoryKeys;
00080        }
00081 
00082        return retVal;
00083 }
00084

00086 // reimplemented (istd::TIFactory)
00087 
00088 template <class InterfaceType>
00089 InterfaceType* TComposedFactory<InterfaceType>::CreateInstance(const QByteArray& keyId) const
00090 {
00091        for (         typename FactoryList::const_iterator iter = m_factoryList.begin();
00092                             iter != m_factoryList.end();
00093                             ++iter){
00094               const FactoryPtr& factoryPtr = *iter;
00095 
00096               InterfaceType* createdPtr = factoryPtr->CreateInstance(keyId);
00097 
00098               if (createdPtr != NULL){
00099                      return createdPtr;
00100               }
00101        }
00102 
00103        return NULL;
00104 }
